error.message: The spaceless tag in "modules/contrib/views_filters_summary/templates/views-filters-summary.html.twig" at line 20 is deprecated since Twig 2.7, use the "spaceless" filter with the "apply" tag instead. See https://drupal.org/node/3071078.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
